attributes.background: The Sun newspaper has had a history of creating sensationalist headlines in order to create a knee jerk reaction from the public, more often than not, these headlines have little research behind them, or no research at all. "Facts" have been invented and outright lies have been told to sell papers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The press is operationally and editorially independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

If you wish to make a complaint about a specific article you can get in touch with the Independent Press Standards Organisation here: https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/index.html
